'''Asphodel Burrows, n√©e Brandybuck''', was a Hobbit of [[the Shire]].

==History==
Asphodel was the daughter of [[Gorbadoc Brandybuck]] and [[Mirabella Took]]. She married [[Rufus Burrows]], and their child, [[Milo Burrows]], was born in {{SR|1347}}. They all attended [[Bilbo's Farewell Party|Bilbo's Party]] in {{SR|1401}}.<ref>{{App|Brandybuck}}</ref>

==Etymology==
"[[Asphodel]]" is a plant of the lily family with white, yellow or pink flowers.
